Text:
With height of 264 the subs during the Klingon bit will be lost.  Since it is such a brief scene, and the value of it to the movie is non-existent, a chopped version like this is actually better than ANY of the blurred watermarked versions.  

The adaptive blur moves around and draws your eye, detracting from the movie far more than you would expect.  So this is probably one of the better versions out right now video wise.  The audio is only 128 Kbps though, and there are versions with 256.  You might find one that is chopped with 256 audio.
Fake release with dameged pic on left site. Get the Original from PSO its an better wuality then that bullshit of dickheads.
